text: 'inh fkkar fi nfsh, whyaa ma yaquluh min altaen fi muhamad walqran, faluein, wasthq bdhlk alhlak, kayf aedd fi nafsih hdha alten? thuma luein kdhlk, thuma tammal fima qddar whyaa min altaen fi alqran, thuma qttab wjhh, washtdd fi alebws walkuluh lmma daqat ealayh alhyl, walam yajid mtenana yten bih fi alqran, thuma raje merdana ean alhq, wteazm 'ana yetrf bh, faqal ean alqran: ma hdha aldhy yaquluh muhamad 'illa sihr yunql ean alawlyn, ma hdha 'iilaa kalam almkhlwqyn tellamh muhamad mnhm, thuma addaea 'anah min eind allh
